**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 145 1.1 **Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) --- You focus on the intricacies of the magic binding you to your eidolon to extend the duration of your [_boost eidolon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1045) or [_reinforce eidolon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1050) spell. If your next action is to cast _boost eidolon_ or _reinforce eidolon_, attempt a skill check with the skill associated with the tradition of magic you gain from your eidolon (such as [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) for a [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) eidolon). The DC is usually a [standard-difficulty DC](/Rules.aspx?ID=554) of your level, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check. **Critical Success** The spell lasts 4 rounds.
**Success** The spell lasts 3 rounds.
**Failure** The spell lasts 1 round, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.
